response.original_title: Spaded: A Surf Film by Joe Crimo
response.overview: Surf icon Joe Crimo directs this documentary featuring many of his hometown surf breaks ridden by a variety of top local talent, including Eric McHenry, Gavin Beschen, Zach Rhinehart, Gregory Domingo, Gavin Sutherland and more. Set to a hardcore punk soundtrack from the likes of Judge D, Last Laugh, Big B, Humble Gods, and Phunk Junkeez, the film captures mind-blowing aerials that are sure to inspire surfers everywhere.
response.title: Spaded: A Surf Film by Joe Crimo
